name: SpaceExcavators
description:
Anime Studio “Sanzigen” comes out with their own retro game!
“ID-0” has become a side scrolling shooting game on Steam!
Operate the I-Machine of ID0 to mine and discover new Orichalt ores!

Game Introduction 1: Story
With the comrades of Excavators General Partnership (Excavators GP), clear the stages as you face the United Planets Force (UPF) and rivaling company I-Machine, while also destroying obstacles drifting in outer space. Consisting of 5 stages, at the end of each level, players will find difficult Orichalt to excavate and face powerful bosses. At the final stage, “that man” may be waiting for ID0…?!

Game Introduction 2: Battle
There are enemies that can be beaten with one or two hits, but others that can’t be defeated unless their stamina runs out. Attack power can be strengthened up to 3 levels by acquiring items, so don’t fail to capture them. Also, it’s possible to change your BUDDY that fights alongside ID0. Attack stats are different for each BUDDY, so fight strategically for each stage.

Game Introduction 3: Gaming Tips
Don’t miss out on the hints that appear during the game, and use the bombs to clear all stages! Look out for hints hiding within the conversation of the characters that appear at the start of each stage!
You can wipe out enemies with “MATTSUN (Bomb)”, which you can obtain throughout the stage. Think strategically and activate when you’re ready.
